PASSES.NO_KIDS: Due to security measures in place, we have decided that our event will be for adults only. We hope that this decision does not prevent us from having your presence.

GIFT_TABLE.MESSAGE: Our home is complete, but if you want to give us a gift, add miles to our honeymoon!

ENVELOPE_RAIN.MESSAGE: Or if you prefer a cash gift, you can do so at our envelope rain table that will be at the event.
